website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling brush set that is ideal for individuals who don't need a lot of brushes. A good value, but not as well-made as others we researched.
pros: Extremely soft makeup brushes that stand out for their thick, easy-to-grip handles
Their soft texture makes makeup application easy and effective
cons: We noticed that this makeup brush set had a slight smell of chemicals

customer_reviews.title: if you're looking for good makeup brushes
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying; if you're looking for good makeup brushes, look no further! I like to wear makeup just as much as every other 24 year old girl. Ive been using the same brushes since I was 16, that I purchased from HEB (a grocery store in TX). I like my makeup, but I don't like it enough to spend over $20 on a set of brushes lol. So when I found these for $10 I felt like I hit the jackpot! The brussels are not flimsy, and apply my makeup evenly. I would recommend these to all of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: SarcherTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: They changed the QUALITY👎
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. I have purchased several sets from this company for years. I have changed the look & quality of these brushes. They are cheap looking & the quality has gone down & the cut on the brushes are longer. I will no longer be purchasing. Will find new seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these brushes
customer_reviews.text: I love these brushes. I was a little skeptical before purchasing due to the price, however they are really good. I'm a makeup artist and I have a variety of brands when it comes to brushes as well as makeup and these brushes are perfect and inexpensive. I've even purchased these for my aunt and mother to use on a daily basis. The brushes will need to be washed once you receive them due to a little odor, but you should wash any brush you receive anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these brushes!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great brushes. These have become my favorite blending brushes for foundation, and contour. When it comes to my eyeshadow, I use different higher end brushes, the only brush in this set I don't love is the eye shadow brush. However, that is personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: KLadd82

customer_reviews.title: very nice soft set
customer_reviews.text: i bought mine from 'Favorite cos store' seller and have no issues with them. arrive with no chemical smell like some mentioned, were nicely packaged and none were broken/loose. they are super soft brushes and so far no shedding from the two brushes i have used and for $10 i would buy them again if they do happen to break/etc after 3mths. Would give them 5 stars but, i have not used these long enough to dertimine if they are or not yet.
customer_reviews.author: Casper & BooTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE SMELL AND CHEMICAL ON THEM CAUSES BREAKOUTS
customer_reviews.text: I should of known the price was too good to be true! I started immediately breaking out all over my face!! That chemically smell and whatever chemical is on it is very irritating!!!!! Ruined my skin. If you purchase this you must wash them immediately which is crazy because I never had to do that with any quality makeup brush. This isn't quality. They feel great and look great but will irritate the skin severely ! No wonder it is so affordable. I won't ever purchase again. They sent a letter that the smell is from being in the plastic, but that is a LIE!!!!! There is something physically on these brushes and it is so OFF!
customer_reviews.author: Classy C

customer_reviews.title: Amazballs
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Nice and fluffy and great for blending anything. Just as pictured. Best cheap brushes. I've found yet. Not as good as my sigma but you won't find anything else this cheap with great quality. I was in search of more brushes for my kit. MUA on iG Glamkrazy. See the models I used them on
customer_reviews.author: Trice

customer_reviews.title: The keep putting 3 starts when im trying to put 1
customer_reviews.text: I dislike how most of the brushes have no label on them to make it easier to use. One has a label telling what to use it for and i get it you can do what ever with but no! I would rather get some help and the other brushes dont say anything but one or two brushes! And i will see how they hold up after i wash them. Update: the bristles are horrible i usually wash my brushes with shampoo..no problem no issues but these messed up the next day when i went to apply make to my clean brushes and the bristles were stuck on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Lov_Soul

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the brushes are very soft, and they rarely shed when I use them. I use all of the brushes. I used to use a damp beauty blender, but now I use the flat angled brush for my foundation, and it blends perfectly onto the skin for the perfected airbrushed look. I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Cantey

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous brushes for cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous brushes for cheap! Don't waste your money buying expensive brushes. These get the job done just perfectly. I've had 0 fall out and I've washed my brushes about 4 or 5 times so far. I love how soft they are, and they look very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, great feel
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are a lot nicer than I expected. The bristles are super soft, yet stand up to anything I've done so far. Pressed powder, loose powder, blush, eye shadow ... all went on perfectly smooth and finished well. I love the feel of the handles, very sturdy, yet light weight. I washed them in shampoo and dried them completely before using them, and couldn't be more pleased. I'll buy another set at this price and hold onto them for backups! LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: CactusMomma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brushes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They’re dense, do not shed, sturdy and blend beautifully. When you open the package, the brushes do smell like paint but there was a note attached to the brushes warning about this and saying to wash the brushes (which you should do anyways) and let them dry. I washed the brushes with baby soap and the smell was pretty much instantly gone. Whether you’re a beginner or experienced, these brushes are worth it in your collection because of their performance and their inexpensive price!!
customer_reviews.author: MermaidQueen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Price Point
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on sale for like $8 and I was worried they would be horrible quality because 1 brush at a store is more than that, let alone an entire set. I’m happy to say I was decently surprised. They aren’t the top of the line but they get the job done and have held up well so far. They come smelling like plastic but I just had to wash them once and it was no longer an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Thigpen

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Quality
customer_reviews.text: Typically I buy high end makeup brushes i.e (Tom Ford, Marc Jacobs, Chanel) but was needing a new foundation brush and didn't want to spend the $45-60 on one brush. These brushes are soft, dense, thick synthetics and do not shed! They feel heavy and expensive in your hand. The tips are actually purple which the picture doesn't fully illustrate. This set is mainly for the use of the face like (foundation, powder, concealers, blush, cream blushes, contour & highlighters) If you are looking for brushes for eye shadows then this is not for you. Only thing that was a buzz kill was that they arrived in 5-6 days when I'm a PM.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a good deal
customer_reviews.text: Virtually fell apart within a few days of owning them, the bristles fell out on all the brushes. Looks like a good deal, but not such a good deal if they don't last even a reasonable amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Holsen

customer_reviews.title: Better than I ever could expect!
customer_reviews.text: Considering I accidentally bought these a few days ago when I hit the “buy now” button I’m actually really pleased 😂 It was like getting a surprise gift. Anyway they are actually really nice for how cheap they are , comparable to the Sonia kashuk line from target. I’ve tried expensive, drug store and low cost brushes and these are good for the price. Only two hairs fell out so that’s amazing. The only negative thing I have to say is the #8 and #9 brushes are a little too stiff and in my opinion not very useful. Other than that great!
customer_reviews.author: Jon  Mortonstout

customer_reviews.title: Good Brushes; however, Tops came off after extended use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a Christmas gift for my girlfriend. When she opened them, she was super excited and loved them. They held up for a decent amount of time before the tops started to come off and she really doesn't use them anymore, because she's found better ones. I would still say they're a good buy for the price. They seemed to be good brushes, especially if you're looking for some travel brushes, extra brushes to have just in case, etc. I would just suggest having some Gorilla glue around once the brush head starts to separate.
customer_reviews.author: JamesTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brushes, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on a thursday, received the following monday. fast shipping. Really beautiful brushes especially for the price comes with a card that mentions why they might smell like paint and how to fix that. Mine didn't. They were fine. card also mentions how/who to contact if an there's an issue. Appreciate that the company appears to want to provide a good product and cares about the customer. Used a few of the brushes today and they are really nice. The packaging is also nice. The back of the box as well as the card provided describe each brush and typical uses for the brushes, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Your Money or Wasting Your Makeup
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t apply or blend liquid foundation well. So much product is wasted when using these brushes. I can use 1-2 pumps of foundation for my entire face when using a sponge. When using the foundation brush with this set, I use 4-5 times more makeup. Also, bristles started falling out during first use. The money you “save” on these cheap brushes will be spent buying more makeup because so much is wasted when using these.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: good value but may not hold up to being washed and used everyday
customer_reviews.text: They work pretty well but you can tell after a few good months of use that they are cheap. I have to wash my brushes 1-2 a month due to acne issues. These brushes aren’t holding up the best after washing. I do use special brush shampoo and even tried to re-glue all the handles back down, and be super careful not to rub & Matt the brush hair. Overall, I would recommend as maybe a back up set or travel set. They are not horrible and the price is great. You get a ton of brushes too.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and affordable brush set
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality brushes, I can't believe they cost so little! The brushes had a very faint plastic/chemical smell coming out of the package (hardly noticeable unless I stuck my nose up to the brush), but that smell went completely away after an initial wash. I believe it was just from the packaging. There was no shedding in the first wash and the brushes have held their shape perfectly upon drying. The bristles are incredibly soft and dense which makes them perfect for face makeup. Absolutely love! They also came packed in a plastic box instead of a flimsy bag which was great so that they couldn't get flattened or damaged during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these brushes! They are incredibly soft on your skin, no irritating bristles to deal with. While soft, they are still able to grab whatever makeup you are using and firm enough to do some nice detail work with your routine. Lots of angled and tapered brushes. They are full sized brushes. Let me say that again.. FULL SIZED BRUSHES! I haven't had any issues with losing bristles that is usually a concern at this price. I am thrilled with the quality I see in these brushes for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I ordered these back in 2013.. They're still working amazingly and some of the eyeshadow brushes are my favorite brushes! (even over the ones I bought from Sephora!!) This is a great buy! _____________________________________________________________ LOVE these brushes.. You get so many great brushes for such a great price. They work really well, are soft, and don't leave any bristles on your face like some brushes too. Would definitely recommend. You can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Myers

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly soft brush set!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a beginner with makeup but I believe in value for money and this set fits the bill. The bristles are soft and it helps to apply my liquid makeup evenly. I usually don’t go for a lot of brushes but this kit has the right amount that I need. It’s perfect for someone like me who is not overly fussy about a whole lot of brushes that you don’t even use. Will purchase a set as a gift for my daughter. My only con with this set is that initially, the brushes have a paint smell but this goes away when left unopened.
customer_reviews.author: Mich C

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I decided to purchase this item. I'm so happy I did, they seemed to be very professional type makeup brushes and good quality. I love how they label the brushes, especially for an beginner like me. This item really blends your foundation, blush and eyeshadow on very well. It's so unbelievable that this item was only $7.99, they are sturdy and feels nice on my face. Remember viewer's I'm just a beginner, first time learning to put on makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Ora

customer_reviews.title: They've held up well for the pricce
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these brushes for several months and i am pleased with them. During quarantine I have been experimenting more than usual with different makeup styles, and it has been easy using these brushes. The fibers don't shed at all, which is a problem I've found with other similarly priced brush sets. I would recommend these especially for beginners or people who are just starting to wear more makeup
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Great face brushes, less useful eye brushes.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these brushes for several months now and have been very impressed. I mainly use the larger face brushes for my foundation application and they are super soft, do a great job applying product evenly and don't shed when washed. The smaller eye brushes I used rarely because they really aren't suited to any task I need. They're either too large for blending the eye or just oddly shaped. However, I think this set is still worth it just for the large brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Fry

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because a few of my Elf brushes were starting to break. I wasn't expecting these to be amazing because they were so cheap. However when I received the brushes and used them for the first time, they were amazing!! They are great quality brushes. A few others had posted that the brushes smelled funny. When I first removed mine from the packaging, I didn't have that issue at all. They had no smell to them and I was able to use them immediately. I would most definitely purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Vaidean

customer_reviews.title: Love the brushes, hate the smell...
customer_reviews.text: I typically use Sigma brushes and I was extremely hesitant to purchase this set. However, because of the price, I went ahead and bought. I'm very impressed with the brushes and variation of them, but displeased with the chemical stench that is on the brushes when you receive them. I went ahead and throughly washed the brushes and am hoping that they will smell better. Despite the disgusting smell, the brushes are very nice quality and great for bronzer, powder, eyes, etc. UPDATE---- I've been using these for awhile now and really like them. The gross smell is completely gone and they work very well. I use them for everyday shadows and blush/bronzer.
customer_reviews.author: HW9001

customer_reviews.title: Love the foundation brush
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve only used the two foundation brushes from this set because that’s the reason I purchased this. There’s a little guide that shows you what each brush is for. I’ve had expensive makeup brushes and I truthfully like these best. The foundation goes on saying and evenly with perfect buildable coverage. I waste so much less makeup and I don’t have to wash my hands every time I apply it. The set is with the price just for two of the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Nechama Majerczyk

customer_reviews.title: These brushes are fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are fantastic! I read another review that said they came apart very easily and i was prepared to take them apart and glue them together. When I got them however, they were sturdily glued together. Kudos to BS-Mall for fixing an issue with the product. There's a bit of a paint smell but warm water and some light soap easily fixes that.
customer_reviews.author: gravity_koala

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price fool you, they're great.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of makeup brushes and I am very glad I finally got "on board". They have made my routine a breeze and I am not sure why it took so long to make this investment. Which reminds me: they are super quality, buy very reasonably priced. I made a small investment, and gained a lot!
customer_reviews.author: MaryGrace

customer_reviews.title: Treat Yo'Self (or Someone Else!)
customer_reviews.text: Another great deal for the price. The brushes are soft, didn't smell and the packaging looked great. They include a card to help those who aren't as sure what item to us for what. I found that what they call "foundation" brushes for liquid foundation drink up a lot of the product and therefore aren't what to use with expensive liquid makeup, but they worked great for powders. If you are looking for a good set for a budding make-up enthusiast, this would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna

customer_reviews.title: Truly the best for the price...
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy expensive Morphie brushes......but these brushes are awesome and worth every penny. I use them mainly to contour. I cant say enough about these brushes except that they are of excellent quality. The one thing that I will say is that the metal part comes off the wood part easily, but its a quick fix with a hot glue gun. I actually left my blush brush without the metal part since its easier to use. Overall, that small imperfection does not oversee the quality of these brushes.
customer_reviews.author: wendbara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome- full & firm
customer_reviews.text: I really like these brushes. I've had them for a month and one of the bigger ones have popped off the handle, but for the price I honestly have no issues gluing it back together. These are super soft but still VERY full & somewhat firm (perfect for me). They blend makeup really well & don't leave you with any patchy spots.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Set for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are pretty great brushes. They are not quite as soft as I expected, but the quality is not bad by any means. Since I purchased these, I have graduated to a higher quality (and higher priced) set of brushes that I use most of the time, but I will still use some of these occasionally. I would definitely recommend this for a starter set of brushes, the price just can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: great for daily use
customer_reviews.text: I use these guys on the daily and haven't had any issues whatsoever. Great price and great variety included. Haven't had any issues with durability or usage. Came packaged very well and quickly. Easy to clean and hold up well to cleaning. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Amazing brush set! Couldn’t ask for anything better! Knowing Sephora can sell each brush for $20 or so, this was a great steal considering it’s a set for less than that. What a win! Back of the box tells you what each brush is ideal for - contouring, concealer, eyeshadow, bronzer or what not! I am so glad I got this oppose to buying the expensive ones! Great item and just so worth your money! Win big!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with these brushes. They are very small and very stiff (not fluffy). Not at all suitable for blending. Might be ok for applying foundation/concealer since they are very dense, but no good for powders. The eye brushes are way too stiff to use. I bought these for a teen but will buy a different set for her instead. Just to give you an idea of quality: Elf brushes are 50 times better- and those are very low end. Save your money for a better quality set.
customer_reviews.author: RAHR

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 2 years ago and I use them every single day and they're just now kinda losing the bristles. They are packed in very well and they get washed weekly. I haven't had any problems with the ferrel coming off the handle which is surprising because some of my more expensive brushes haven't held up as well. I will be ordering more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Byrd

customer_reviews.title: i love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is soft, dense, nice to look at and most importantly for me, it is affordable. I have had this for over 2 years now! it's still going strong the only thing is the bottom part, the handle came off of some. it's not that big deal, just put some glue and stick it back up lol. great purchase for yourself and for others (mom, sister, granny, aunties, etc)
customer_reviews.author: p1k1

customer_reviews.title: Good brushes at a good cost. Let's see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I am blown away. They are soft and blend my makeup effortlessly. They are not travel brushes so I gave that a low star. For beginners I would give them 2 stars only because a buffing brush for foundation, bronzer ect would probably be difficult for someone never using brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the price -- Brushes shed badly.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 sets for Christmas. They seem to apply makeup well. It's really a great buy for the price. I would buy these again. All three of the people that I purchased them for are currently using them and they all say that they are good quality brushes. **Update** Within 2 weeks all of the brushes are shedding like crazy... I guess with powder they are fine. The foundation brush can't be used.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, soft brushes, MUST have!
customer_reviews.text: The price is outrageous! How can such quality brushes be so afforadable! I replaced all my brushes with these. So soft and luxiourious! Seriously, this is a hidden gem! You can go to a retail store and buy one brush for the price of this set, and still not get the quality of these. They are so good I’ve given them as gifts and people think I spent a mint on them. It’s our secret!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smelled horrible, gave horrendous rash
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are AWFUL! From the second I took them out of their packet, they smelled horribly - almost a chemical smell. I laid them on my dining room table thinking they might air out. My 6 year old son grabbed a couple and was brushing them all over his eyes and face. Within an hour, he had a HORRIFIC allergic reaction. His eyes puffed up and turned red and his cheeks looked almost burnt. These brushes should be pulled from your stock and not sold anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Towrie

customer_reviews.title: They're Okay
customer_reviews.text: I've had these brushes for over half a year now and they've been holding up pretty well. Only one of the brush heads fell off from the stick, and overall they're made of a nice quality and are soft. The bristles don't fall out when you wash them and there's a good variety of them although personally I would've preferred more eye brushes. I took a star off for the brush head falling off since I haven't had them for a long period of time. Overall they're nice starter brushes if you're looking for a pack that has a little bit of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Thach

customer_reviews.title: Do not underestimate the quality
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are so soft and function so well. I have brushes from elf, IT cosmetics, and sephora. for the price and quality, I personally think they are better than elf brushes. and they could compare to softness of high end brushes. I've washed them twice, I only saw a minor hair fall out from angled eyeshadow brush. No hair fall out at all from other brushes. these are my go to brushes from now on. Yes, they did have the smell of plastic when I first used. After I washed with shampoo as they recommended ( there was an instruction), the smell have totally gone :) plus only $2 per brush, you can't go wrong with this .
customer_reviews.author: Ye Htut Aung

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: Looking at it initially appears to be good quality, but it falls apart easily. All of the handle on all of the brushes have already come off & I've only used it once, haven't even washed it & I store it properly. Also, I have very sensitive skin & this brush makes my skin super dry, flakey & tight. The only brushes that seem to maybe work the best is the ones for the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Profile

customer_reviews.title: After 5 yrs, finally showing wear & tear
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for nearly 5 years! The bristles are still in great condition after almost daily use and regular cleaning. The handles of a few of the larger brushes fell off and I couldn't reattach them even with super glue or a glue gun. I like them so much, I'm still using them without the handle and am going to order these again.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: love !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: very good quality, so soft . My foundation glided on ! i order these about every 3-4months because i suffer from acne/cystic acne and im a germaphobe, so after a while i get paranoid and feel like i cant keep em clean bc of my issues . not the products fault at all . i love the quality and what im saying is these brushes are very consistent and cheap (:
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: I only kept half of these but they were still worth it
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are of nice quality and pretty dense, and like the rest of the reviews have said, there is a smell upon opening but it washes out. My biggest problem with this set is the size of the smaller brushes. The handles are too long and thick, and the brush-heads too large to be allow one to work with finer details. That being said, even though I discarded the small brushes, the large ones alone are well worth the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brushes/awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I'm just beginning to explore the wild and wonderful world of make up. I use bare minerals loose power. I bought their $28 angles all over brush and then decided to buy these. I've used both and decided to keep these brushes and return the bare minerals brush to macys. Thankful Macy and amazon prime have great return policies so I could try both and make a decision. $12?!? You can't beat the price! They smelled like paint when I opened the plastic bag that they came in. There's a sheet with the company info and a guide to what brush does why. The info includes what to do when your brushes smell like that- wash in shampoo and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Dong_hut

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are amazing for their cost, soft, durable, do an excellent job blending.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Yes I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great set even better it was on sale. The brushes bristles are very soft they don't come out and fall apart the handles are labeled. And that doesn't come with a bunch of extra brushes I just get in the way gives you what you need and that's perfect for me. Less confusing haha
customer_reviews.author: GabbyMz90

customer_reviews.title: careful if you have a sense of smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knowing they would be cheap, temporary brushes. I knew that the quality wouldn't be very good and I was fine with this decision, however I was not prepared for the horrible, permanent, just spray painted smell that accompanied these. The smell is like the paint smell you would encounter in a car body/detail shop. Its very strong and Does NOT ever go away. I've had these brushes for months now, sitting open to air on a cabinet in my bathroom. I can still smell them when I walk by. Not even time can cure this odor.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent set considering the price.
customer_reviews.text: They have a strong chemical smell but I think after a wash or two they should be fine. I haven't used them yet so I cant tell you how they perform. Overall, it's a pretty decent set considering the price. They feel sturdy and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good brushes
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprise when I received this brush set . It is very soft and feels great on your skin . I love the gold accent on it makes it look expensive but for a cheap price . It goes come with sheet of paper that tells you what they recommend each be use for . So great for beginners . Reasoning for 4 stars was that one of the brushes came with what looks like a little glue stuck on top of it. Another reason was after using them I decided to wash them and some of the bristle where coming out. Didn't fall out put sticking out .
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Inexperienced but Brushes Makes It Easy
customer_reviews.text: I know little about makeup, however, these brushes make it easy. There are two places where each brush is explained so I could figure out which was used for what. They are soooo soft and so far I've had no problems. Mine also didn't smell strongly like some reviewers said. And if the handles come apart, that's a very easy and inexpensive fix, but I haven't had that issues either. So I give it a positive review as it does what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Catlyn

customer_reviews.title: I have had them for a long time and they are still great to use
customer_reviews.text: Fav fav fav brushes! I have had them for a long time and they are still great to use. I will absolutely re-purchase if it lose or break any of them because they are extremely affordable and they look great in my collection. All the brushes are densely packed so they distribute product very well, I don't think I had shedding and a good long handle to them. Super good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for price and quality. Seems like great company too.
customer_reviews.text: My wife really enjoys buying from this seller. I believe this is our 3rd purchase of make up brushes from them. She really appreciates that they provide a pamphlet on how to use them. My wife is a professional make up artist and has used very expensive brushes but finds herself going back to these. She has given some out as gifts , so the how to pamphlet is pretty handy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not lasting...
customer_reviews.text: They were good brushes while they lasted. They're very soft and do a decent job with applying/blending my products... but they're not well made. A few months after I started using them, two of my bigger brushes fell apart - the gold part disconnected from the handle. Then of course, the bristles slowly started falling out. Overall, for the price paid, they were worth it. I'm definitely trying to go with a better made brush for my next purchase - even if I have to pay more. If you want lasting brushes, this isn't the choice for you. If you just need something quick and temporary, they definitely fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: wonderful brushes for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second set of these . I bought an extra set so I can wash one set and not have to wait for them to dry. I kept looking at brushes in stores and the prices were ridiculous compared to these. My first set is 18 mos old and still perfect - bristles don't fall out, blends nicely, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rita3233

customer_reviews.title: i tried and i feel like i have to wash them so often
customer_reviews.text: i tried and i feel like i have to wash them so often...i have two lancome brushes not a fan of the brand but there brushes seem easier to maneuver through my face....i feel like these brushes make my face cacky...plus im not really a big deal and do prefer one two brushes maximum all the others are not really needed, necessary for me....i know many beautiful girls may know what to do with each but Im on rush and just looking to look nice to go to work but not over the top...my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: N. Pena

customer_reviews.title: Great brushes!
customer_reviews.text: Having the right tools is key and these make up brushes are great. They are sturdy and very easy to work with. They are also very easy to clean. Guidelines accompany the brushes so that a novice can learn which brush to use for various applications such as concealer, eye shadow, liquid or powder foundation, etc. Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erykah

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but hairs fall out a BUNCH
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these makeup brushes. Some of them are great, but a few of mine are losing bristles like crazy. The angled face brush loses so many hairs at a time that about 50 pieces come out every time I use it (no exaggeration). However all the brushes are extremely soft and perfect sizes. Just not holding up at all. I haven't had as much fallout from the foundation or flat face brush though and I have been able to use that one regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Brushes that are definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are actually really good brushes! They have a brush for everything u may need and they don’t shed like most cheaper brushes! I would definitely recommend this product and buy again
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Soft brushes, poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Nice brushes, flimsy construction. Yes they are soft and quite frankly there is a lot of redundancy in the amount of brushes and what to use them for. My biggest issue and clearly many others here on amazon, the brush head with metal clamp fell of many of the brushes the first time I used them. Now I happen to be handy and plan to add some adhesive to each clamp and reset each of the handles. The price is cheap, the brushes are soft. Sure I can fix this, but would prefer that I did have to do that. Rather I would have been much happier with FEWER brushes that were constructed well.
customer_reviews.author: K'nala

customer_reviews.title: The brushes themselves are great, but very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The brushes themselves are great, but very cheaply made. The handles are very flimsy. The metal separates from the wood instantly, or after a few uses. I do still use the few that haven't broke. The smaller brushes I prefer to the bigger, and the bigger are not dense enough for me to use for my face. The shape gets deformed, and absorbs too much product, however they blend well and don't leave streaks. Because it's not dense, when using foundation, it sheers it out. But the smaller brushes are perfect. Great for details, concealer, eye shadow, cream shadow.
customer_reviews.author: liora k

customer_reviews.title: love them.
customer_reviews.text: I have not personally used the more expensive brushes, but these are really great, especially for the money. I had someone ask me if I had a makeover after applying my make up with these (not that I didn't look good before they said). creates a beautiful finish. The only thing that could have improved them would be if they had written on the brushes what each is supposed to be for. and included a video. Check out youtube though...lots of videos on how to use this type of brush. I have not had them long, but having washed a couple, I do believe they will hold up. Very attractive as well. no problem leaving them out on my vanity.
customer_reviews.author: pet girl

customer_reviews.title: First time buying a nice make up brush set
customer_reviews.text: First time buying a nice make up brush set. The ones I have used in past I have just accumulated from gifts and what not. These ones came on time and are great! Great deal for the price. My set did not smell like paint at all. The bristles are super soft and do not come out while applying make up or from pulling on them. Checked each handle and none of them were lose. The back of the box they come in also labels what each brush is used for which is very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Courtnee

customer_reviews.title: Super soft full brushes!
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are honestly amazing and SUPER soft! Superrrr happy with the fact that the little hairs from the brushes DO NOT come out! My old set of sephora brushes always lost hairs and it would be all over my face -___- lol. And there is a light smell of paint from the package, but do not worry. It is nottt the brushes. Just discard the bag it was sitting and shipped in. The brushes are clean! Anyways I will definitely buy more <3 it completely made a difference in my makeup look. I would highly recommend it to anyone interested in doing some makeup :)!
customer_reviews.author: monica prasad

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable brush set!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I buy these brushes I gifted the both times to individuals with old or incomplete bush sets and they love them! The brushes are not flimsy at all and blend well. They have a strong chemical smell so o would recommend cleaning these before using them!
customer_reviews.author: Tirsa Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price
customer_reviews.text: The small brushes were not as small as I was expecting and some of the powder brushes seemed a little too small. Initially I reviewed these thatvthe bristles weren’t soft enough. After using a little more, they are fine. They aren’t as nice as my high end brushes, but not terrible. For the price, these aren’t so bad.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Soft and affordable brushes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get into doing my face makeup and saw these on a Buzzfeed article and decided to try them out. Since I'm no makeup guru, these were a very affordable option for me to kick off my makeup routine. I can use the brushes for foundation, contouring, concealer, and eyeshadow, so it really covers all the bases! The brushes are very soft and don't feel cheap at all. I wish they had some smaller/thinner brushes, but otherwise, it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wzhaoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Immune disease
customer_reviews.text: This are so much more comfortable that the retraining stiff ones. I have double it when I went into MD Anderson but other than that they are perfect for everyday use
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Love love love (not durable)
customer_reviews.text: I was a little Leary buying brushes that I couldn’t handle in person before buying. I’m so glad I did. These brushes are so so soft and thick. None of the bristles come out either which is always I big problem with cheap brushes. These are affordable but in no way cheap quality (update ..... love my brushes but after a few mos. of use my handles are falling off :( ) so sad I loved these and recommend them to friends but not too sure now due to durability)
customer_reviews.author: Lpetry

customer_reviews.title: If you can get past the chemical smell...
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have mentioned, these brushes arrived with a STRONG chemical smell. The first thing I did was wash them in a mild baby shampoo (like I do for my other makeup brushes) and let them air dry overnight. A few of the them shed while I was washing them, but not a lot. The next day I noticed that the chemical smell was still there, but only on the brush handles, not the bristles themselves. I think it may be the kind of paint they used on the handles. The brushes are good quality, as they are soft yet dense. If you can get past the lingering smell, I think they're worth the $12.
customer_reviews.author: kathieeverafter

customer_reviews.title: Soft brushes
customer_reviews.text: I bought the brushes so I’d have a few to use for eye make up. The brushes are super soft, but they are not sharp enough to use for eye make up. They’ll work in a pinch, but I’ll be looking for different brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: These are very good
customer_reviews.text: This are very good, very soft, i don't use them every day, but i used them a lot, like 4 times a week. I also clean them a lot. They are the same as the first day i bought them. They haven't deformed at all. And the hairs are all there. haven't loose a single hair yet. So 5 stars. Great brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Raul Yoris Fermin

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of quality brushes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these brushes. They are very soft, there is a great assortment, they do not shed their hairs, and the price can not be beat with the quality and quantity of brushes you get.
customer_reviews.author: Robin S - Cincinnati

customer_reviews.title: Great value!  I could confuse these with my high end sephora brushes!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about these. Great quality! I have low end Walmart to high end sephora and I would put them on the high end list. Yes out of the package it did smell like paint. I wiped them off with a make up brush cleansing wipe and it was gone! No fall out. Very dense. Heads are well attached with the exception of one but a little dab of glue should fix it. The large brushes are labeled. The small are not but they provide a key. I will be purchasing more and giving them out as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy c.

customer_reviews.title: Falling Apart
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are very cheap but if given the chance again, I wouldn't buy them because they came with hairs sticking out, all uneven, and the brush heads have fallen off of the handles - only after a few months of use!
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a good price...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. I was looking for some decent makeup brushes that weren't very expensive and looked for awhile before deciding on these. I've been using them daily for several months now (maybe close to a year?) and they've held up very well. I did have the handle on one brush come apart recently and super glued the two pieces back together and it works fine again. For the price, I don't think it gets much better than these. I'm definitely happy with the quality especially for the good price!
customer_reviews.author: aspencer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Idk why people spend so much money on make up brushes. These are incredible. I have been sent very expensive brushes from some of my make up subscriptions, and none of them even compare to these. Between these and my collection of high end brushes, I always reach for these instead. I refuse to buy Sephora's overpriced brushes now. I can do a full face of make up with this set. Nothing bad to say at all. I can't wait to buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fell of when washed.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to leave a very good review for these brushes because they are soft and very compact, but The bristles of one of the brushes fell of when I washed it. If they would used a better glue these brushes could be the best brushes, and I would no mind paying a little bit more for them. Now I am afraid of washing them. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Goodno

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I updated my entire set and love that it comes with a card telling what brush to use for different items. I just wish it was written on the brush itself!
customer_reviews.author: Madison C

customer_reviews.title: These brushes are GREAT, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are GREAT, especially for the price! I've had mine for an entire year now and use them every day. They have not fallen apart, none of the bristles came out (even after washing/scrubbing them), they do not smell, they're super soft, and are particularly great for applying concealer/etc. I like the different angled brushes for small areas. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: magnolia

customer_reviews.title: very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are perfect, my makeup has never looked so flawless. they are super fluffy and extremely soft. they do come with a weird chemical smell almost like acrylic nails smell but if you wash them they don't smell anymore and they're perfectly fine. overall this is a really really great set of brushes and I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a few months ago, and recently took them on a girl's trip. My friend is a professional MUA and asked what kind of brushes they were and where I got them from. She absolutely loved them. These brushes are soft and durable, and apply product very well. I have purchased much more expensive brushes and the handle was seperating from the base before you could get a few good uses out of them. These are excellent and the price is just awesome. I had to buy a set for my friend so that she could start using them immediately in her kit.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: So far these are a go!
customer_reviews.text: For $10, this is an unbelievable buy! They are soft, they blend things well and I would buy them over and over again. That actually feel better than some of my very expensive brushes! I have only been using them for a couple of weeks, but if they stand the test of time I will buy the eye brushes also.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Naatjes

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. All the bigger brushes are the same density. No big fluffy powder brush, which is what I really was hoping would be included, the "round face brush" it comes with is certainly not suitable for applying powder. I also cannot return these. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Smooth blending brushes
customer_reviews.text: I like smooth blending feel to brushes. Good variety for mineral mkeup foundation. I like couple angled brush options for bronzer/highlighter and blush. Includes directions for each brush and cleaning. I am anxious to try my new mineral makeup w these brushes. They feel great on my skin and Seem durable. Kabuki brush May not be big enough to fully blend mineral foundation but it’s great starter set. If I need to order single kabuki brush later I may. No complaints. Very satisfied. Amazon delivered during holiday very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Reuben

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I loved these brushes. I have had them for years. They lasted very well. Be careful not to get water into the brush. Don’t allow water to run down into the brush barrel. It weakens the glue and loosens the hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brushes
customer_reviews.text: I've used these at least 3 years, these are incredible, very soft, blend make up well. The metal and wood parts have broken off for some brushes but that's not a big concern (easy fix-and make up application function is the best) so I don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Margerie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I think these brushes are great for the price. The size is perfect for traveling because the length is short enough to fit in most makeup cases. I don't use really any of the smaller brushes but the large ones are great for foundation, blending, etc. I haven't had to deal with the hairs coming out either
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Buy them
customer_reviews.text: These are great first set of makeup brushes they come individually wrapped in one package. Super soft they have a thickness to them so they're easy to hold on to. Don't have any weird chemical smells.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Great in every way, I was told to give these a try and I'm glad I did. I use the flat face brush and the tapered face brush the most. They clean well, are really soft, and give a smooth application
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: ultra soft brushes, professional quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this make up brush set on Friday and they arrived today. These brushes are exactly what I hoped them to be! Ultra soft bristles yet, strong, thick and full brush heads. The handles are also thick and easy to hold. High quality, professional make up brushes without the costly expense!!! I am sooooo happy with my purchase of these brushes because of the quality! No shedding, strong, packed, thick brush heads, and ultra soft, smooth on the skin. There is a factory odor, but not a big deal, it will go away.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these brushes for over a year and about to order another set as back up. They are long lasting and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Shellene Reese

customer_reviews.title: Good brushes
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are very soft and dense. I have not seen any shedding so far. I really love these brushes for the price you can't go wrong. **UPDATE** after just over one month of use one the brushes has broken. The handle fell of of it, and two more of them have loose handles. I still like the the brushes they have stayed soft and kept their shape through multiple washings, and I still have not seen any shedding. I plan to buy another set but this time I will keep my hot glue gun handy for repairs as another reviewer suggested.
customer_reviews.author: dorsey3

product_meta.title: BS-MALL(TM) Makeup Brushes Premium Makeup Brush Set Synthetic Kabuki Cosmetics Foundation Blending Blush Eyeliner Face Powder Brush Makeup Brush Kit (10pcs, Golden Black)
feature_bullets: Brand new and high quality.100% Money Back Guarantee if you are not satisfied.
Silky Soft.Makes Applying Makeup a Luxurious Experience.
Bold handle for easy use.Highest quality material, high density bristle, high quality Synthetic fiber hair , Does Not SHED!!!
Soft and silky to touch,the brushes are dense and shaped well.Worth the price.
BS-MALL(TM) Premium Synthetic Kabuki Makeup Brush Set-Amazing Quality!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
